response.job_title: I help organizations overcome linguistic barriers through English-Spanish translation.
response.summary:
I enjoy discovering connections between things and finding recurring patterns in the world around me. 

As I thought this way of thinking could be useful in process optimization and problem-solving, I pursued a career in industrial engineering.

However, I've always loved reading and writing, and have a penchant for trying to understand different languages. That's how I managed to learn English on my own.

As part of my work as an engineer, I've had to produce technical documents, and to do so, my language skills have proven essential, since my employers have required me to write documents in English, in addition to my native Spanish.

Over these past few years, I've taken part in several projects undertaken by companies, in which either written or oral communication with foreign staff is needed. My background has allowed me to tackle a wide array of documents, including (but not limited to) SOPs, business proposals, and financial documents. I've contributed to the success of these projects by translating documents or providing consecutive interpreting for meetings.

I strive to express ideas clearly, either in written text or speech. And I make an effort to always go beyond the expectations of the people I work with, by not limiting myself to just convey a message accurately, but doing so in a way that feels understandable and familiar to the person to whom it is addressed, while respecting the original meaning and intent of the original text/speaker. 

By being inquisitive, researching and learning constantly, listening to (and asking for) feedback, I actively search how to improve my work in every possible way, to achieve an end result with which my clients, work teams or co-workers are satisfied with.
response.skills: Traducción, Lenguas extranjeras, Documentación, Traducción técnica, Sistema de gestión de la calidad, Planificación estratégica, Estrategia empresarial, Redacción de textos científicos, Redacción de textos académicos, Redacción creativa, Engineering, Multilingüismo, Administración y dirección de empresas, Redacción técnica, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Teamwork, Leadership, Comunicaciones, English

profile_positions.description:
•	Elaboración de manual de procedimientos, de acuerdo a las norma NTC 6001 e ISO 9001.
•	Diseño de perfiles de cargo .
•	Diseño del sistema de seguridad y salud en el trabajo SG-SST.
•	Realizar procesos de selección y vinculación de personal.
•	Velar por la afiliación de los trabajadores al sistema de seguridad social en salud.
•	Manejar y actualizar los registros de la información del personal.
•	Presupuestar gastos varios.
•	Calcular costos de producción.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero industrial

company.name: RWS Group
company.description:
We are the world’s leading provider of technology-enabled language, content management and intellectual property services. We help our customers to connect with people globally by communicating business critical content at scale, and enabling the protection and realization of their ideas and innovations.

We work with 90 of top 100 global brands, the top 10 pharmaceutical companies and 18 of the top 20 patent filers worldwide.
